id: Digital: A customizable portfolio for creators powered by Notion & Super
name: Digital: A customizable portfolio for creators powered by Notion & Super
description: Digital is a highly customizable Super template designed to feature projects and writing from digital creators. Make Digital your own by changing the background, text, and accent colors. You can even choose between modern or traditional typography, depending on the aesthetic you're looking for. Digital Demo Site ↗Digital is designed and built by Matt Downey — a digital creator at the intersection of design, crypto, and mindset. The images for all projects were kindly licensed by Christos.Please
